events.title: Jazz Night at The Blue Note
events.description: Live jazz performance featuring the Maddenville Five. Step back in time to the roaring twenties with authentic 1920s jazz standards.

events.title: Small Business Saturday
events.description: Support local businesses with special promotions and discounts throughout the historic district. Free gift with purchase at participating locations.

events.title: Thanksgiving Historical Dinner
events.description: Experience a traditional 1920s Thanksgiving celebration with period-accurate recipes, decorations, and entertainment.

events.title: Winter Farmers Market
events.description: Fresh local produce, artisan goods, baked goods, and handmade crafts. Supporting local farmers and makers.

events.title: Prohibition Era Costume Ball
events.description: Dress in your finest 1920s attire! Costume contest, live jazz band, specialty cocktails, and Charleston dance lessons.

events.title: Maddenville Historical Society Meeting
events.description: Monthly meeting featuring a presentation on the history of Brentwood Boulevard's architecture. Open to the public.

events.title: Holiday Shopping Preview Night
events.description: Get a head start on holiday shopping! Extended hours, refreshments, live music, and exclusive preview of holiday merchandise.

events.title: Swing Dance Workshop
events.description: Learn the Charleston, Lindy Hop, and other jazz-age dances. No partner required. All skill levels welcome.

events.title: Veterans Day Commemoration
events.description: Honoring our veterans with a special ceremony, wreath laying, and historical presentations about Maddenville servicemen.

events.title: Art Walk & Gallery Opening
events.description: Explore local art galleries, meet artists, enjoy wine and appetizers. Featuring works inspired by Maddenville's rich history.

events.title: Speakeasy Saturday: Password Night
events.description: Authentic speakeasy experience! Get tonight's password on social media or from participating businesses. Live jazz and era cocktails.

events.title: Black Friday Local Shopping Day
events.description: Skip the big box stores! Exclusive deals and doorbusters at local businesses. Early bird specials 7-9 AM.

events.title: 1920s Film Series: The Jazz Singer
events.description: Classic silent film screening with live piano accompaniment. Popcorn and period candies available.

events.title: Wine & Jazz Pairing Evening
events.description: Five course wine pairing with live jazz quartet. Limited seating. Reservations required.

events.title: Holiday Window Display Contest
events.description: Vote for your favorite holiday window display! Businesses compete for best theme, most creative, and best use of vintage elements.
